pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, July 17, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Sutherlands River, Nova Scotia

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Premier of Nova Scotia, Stephen McNeil. A media availability will follow.

East Pictou Middle School
163 School Road

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

Antigonish, Nova Scotia

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nova Scotia, Stephen McNeil.

Morrison Hall
4500 Alumni Crescent
St. Francis Xavier University

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity only
    • Media should arrive no later than 11:30 a.m. and present themselves to Morrison Hall.

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community barbeque and deliver remarks.

St. Francis Xavier University
University Avenue at Alumni Crescent

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 11:30 a.m. and present themselves to Morrison Hall.
